message: Too many requests, i guess your site is slow, isn't it?
Too many CSS files, use concatenation
Too many JS files, use concatenation
Too many images, use lazyloading
Too many small images, build sprites
Total image size (bytes) is too high, try image optimisation
Too many custom fonts, tell the designer you don't want that
Number of 404 errors
Some static assets are requested multiple times
Number of images without dimensions
Reduce size of comments in HTML
Reduce the number of whitespaces in HTML
Reduce the number of DOM elements
Remove all document.write() calls
Number of Javascript errors
Remove console.log or console.*whatever*, they can break IE8
Reduce number of DOM queries
Many duplicated DOM queries, try to save results into variables
Reduce number of DOM insertions
Reduce number of Sizzle calls (= jQuery DOM queries)
Reduce size of headers sent (cookies?)
